title: Blossoming Lotus
typeOfFood: Vegan, American, International, Organic, Raw, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Catering, Fusion, Gourmet
description: Opened since 2009, this is a sit-down, casual nice vegan restaurant in Portland Lloyd District. Features world fusion cuisine blending influences from different regions, and offers both cooked and live food with gluten free options. Has a wine bar and weekday happy hour, brunch on the weekend. Reservation may be required for 6 or more guests. An offspring of the Blossoming Lotus restaurant from Kauai, Hawaii.
